title: Elite Virtual Assistant for Real Estate Course, Podcast Launch and Social Media Growth
job_overview:
Elite Virtual Assistant for Real Estate Course, Podcast Launch and Social Media Growth
Job Overview: We are seeking an exceptionally skilled Virtual Assistant to serve as a right-hand generalist in launching an online real estate course and podcast over the next year. This is a dynamic role for a proactive, tech-savvy professional who can wear many hats and thrive without micromanagement. You will start part-time on a trial basis (approximately 10–20 hours/week), with US business hours availability, and the role can expand to a long-term (12+ months) engagement if you consistently deliver top-quality results. We maintain high standards and will offer an ongoing partnership to only the top 0.01% of candidates – if you’re SMART, FAST, and HARD-WORKING and take pride in excellence, keep reading!
